prompt: Create a small brochure site for "Lumen Studio". Return a JSON blob that validates against /site.config.schema.json. Include home.hero.title, home.hero.subtitle, home.features (3 items with title and description), about.blurb (1-2 sentences), contact.emailPlaceholder. Do not include secrets. Keep hero title under 8 words and feature descriptions under 120 characters.

expected_output.name: Lumen Studio
expected_output.description: Creative design studio providing innovative solutions for modern brands and businesses

hero.title: Creative Design Solutions by Lumen
hero.subtitle: We transform your brand vision into stunning digital experiences that captivate and convert.

features.title: Brand Design
features.description: Complete brand identity packages including logos, typography, and visual guidelines for your business.

features.title: Web Development
features.description: Modern, responsive websites built with cutting-edge technology and optimized for performance.

features.title: Digital Strategy
features.description: Data-driven marketing strategies that help your brand reach and engage the right audience.

about.blurb: Lumen Studio is a creative design agency specializing in brand identity and digital experiences. We help businesses shine brighter in the digital landscape.

contact.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to get started

prompt: Generate a professional consulting website for "Apex Advisory Group". Include 4 features on the home page focusing on business consulting services. Add an about page with a brief company description. Make sure all content validates against the schema.

expected_output.name: Apex Advisory Group
expected_output.description: Strategic business consulting firm helping companies achieve peak performance and sustainable growth

hero.title: Strategic Business Growth with Apex
hero.subtitle: Expert consulting services to optimize operations, increase profitability, and drive sustainable business growth.

features.title: Strategic Planning
features.description: Comprehensive business strategy development to align your operations with long-term growth objectives.

features.title: Process Optimization
features.description: Streamline operations and eliminate inefficiencies to boost productivity and reduce costs.

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Data-driven insights and KPI tracking to measure success and identify improvement opportunities.

features.title: Change Management
features.description: Expert guidance through organizational transformations and business restructuring initiatives.

about.blurb: Apex Advisory Group delivers proven consulting solutions to mid-market companies. Our experienced team helps businesses navigate complex challenges and achieve sustainable growth through strategic planning and operational excellence.

prompt: Create a portfolio website for "Digital Craftworks" - a web development agency. Include home page with hero and 3 features about their services. Add contact page with email placeholder. Keep descriptions concise and professional.

expected_output.name: Digital Craftworks
expected_output.description: Professional web development agency crafting custom digital solutions for modern businesses

hero.title: Custom Web Solutions by Craftworks
hero.subtitle: We build powerful, scalable websites and applications that drive business growth and user engagement.

features.title: Fast Development
features.description: Rapid prototyping and development cycles to get your project to market quickly and efficiently.

features.title: Secure & Scalable
features.description: Enterprise-grade security and architecture designed to grow with your business needs.

features.title: Custom Solutions
features.description: Tailored web applications built specifically for your business requirements and goals.

contact.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email for project discussion

prompt: Build a healthcare practice website for "WellCare Medical Center". Include 4 features about medical services, about page with practice information, and contact page. Use professional medical tone.

expected_output.name: WellCare Medical Center
expected_output.description: Comprehensive healthcare services providing compassionate medical care for patients and families

hero.title: Compassionate Care at WellCare Medical
hero.subtitle: Providing comprehensive healthcare services with a focus on patient wellness, preventive care, and treatment excellence.

features.title: Primary Care
features.description: Comprehensive primary care services including preventive medicine, wellness exams, and chronic care management.

features.title: Specialized Medicine
features.description: Expert specialists providing advanced medical care across multiple disciplines and treatment areas.

features.title: Diagnostic Services
features.description: State-of-the-art diagnostic imaging and laboratory services for accurate medical assessments.

features.title: Patient Support
features.description: Comprehensive patient education, care coordination, and ongoing support throughout treatment.

about.blurb: WellCare Medical Center has been serving the community for over 20 years with compassionate, comprehensive healthcare. Our experienced medical team is dedicated to promoting wellness and providing exceptional patient care.

contact.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to schedule an appointment

prompt: Create a nonprofit organization website for "Green Future Initiative". Include home page with mission-focused hero, 3 features about environmental programs, about page with organization background, and contact for volunteers.

expected_output.name: Green Future Initiative
expected_output.description: Environmental nonprofit organization dedicated to sustainable practices and climate action for future generations

hero.title: Building a Sustainable Future Together
hero.subtitle: Join our mission to protect the environment through community action, education, and sustainable practices that create lasting change.

features.title: Environmental Education
features.description: Community workshops and educational programs to raise awareness about environmental issues and solutions.

features.title: Sustainability Projects
features.description: Local conservation initiatives including recycling programs, clean energy projects, and habitat restoration.

features.title: Policy Advocacy
features.description: Working with policymakers to advance environmental legislation and sustainable development practices.

about.blurb: Green Future Initiative was founded in 2018 to address pressing environmental challenges through community engagement and education. We believe collective action creates meaningful environmental impact.

contact.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to volunteer or learn more

prompt: Generate a SaaS product landing page for "CloudSync Pro". Focus on software benefits, include 4 features highlighting key capabilities, about page with company info, and contact for demos.

expected_output.name: CloudSync Pro
expected_output.description: Cloud-based file synchronization and collaboration platform designed for modern businesses and teams

hero.title: Seamless File Sync with CloudSync
hero.subtitle: Streamline your team's workflow with secure, real-time file synchronization and collaboration tools built for modern businesses.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Instant file synchronization across all devices and platforms with conflict resolution and version control.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-grade encryption, access controls, and compliance features to protect your sensitive business data.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Seamless sharing, commenting, and collaboration tools to keep your team productive and connected.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive usage analytics and reporting to monitor team productivity and file access patterns.

about.blurb: CloudSync Pro was built by a team of cloud infrastructure experts to solve the challenges of modern file management. We help businesses stay productive with secure, reliable file synchronization.

contact.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email for a free demo
